mapper.select: select * from room where room_date=#{room_date} and room_type=#{room_type}
select room_rem from room where room_seq=${room_seq}
mapper.update: update room set room_rem=${room_rem} where room_seq=${room_seq}
mapper.select: select * from room where room_type=#{room_type} order by room_date
mapper.update: update room set room_date=#{room_date},room_rem=50 where room_seq=${room_seq}
